paper_abstract: This paper presents Bayes estimators for the reliability measures of the individual components in a multi-component systems in the presence of masked system life test data. The life time distributions of the system components are assumed to be geometric with different parameters. Two-sided Bayesian probability intervals of the parameters are also derived. Numerical simulation study is given in order to: (i) explain how one can apply the theoretical results obtained, (ii) study the influence of the sample size and masking level on the accuracy of point estimates. (C) 2007 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Bayes estimators for reliability measures in geometric distribution model using masked system life test data
